Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to membership of the board of the Niagara frontier authority
Summary: Increases the membership of the board of the Niagara frontier authority to include a representative of the transit dependent community.
LawCode: Amd ยง1299-c, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the composition of the board of the Niagara Frontier transportation authority
